txt.en: Bring the swords to Numûru, leader of the Subuzûri. He can be found near Urmâkh's eastern gate.
Picked up wood for Nukûsh's forge ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collect the swords Nukûsh has forged for deliver to Numûru.

'My thanks to you. It’s been fair too long since we had fresh blades. These will cut the Barkhûshim quite well, and any others who draw Mizâdi's ire. Give my regards, and that of the Subuzûri, to Nukûsh.'
Douse the blades in the dousing bucket ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'My thanks to you. It’s been fair too long since we had fresh blades. These will slice the Barkhûshim quite well. Give my regards, and that of the Subuzûri, to Nukûsh.'

'There you are. Well you've gathered plenty of both at least. Leave them there, I'll take care of the ore. Add the wood to the fire, it's getting low. Then you can bring these swords to Numûru. Hope you don't mind sweating, there's no loafing here.'
Bring the swords to Numûru in Urmâkh
Deliver Nukûsh's newly forged swords to Numûru in Urmâkh. Numûru can be found by Urmâkh's eastern gate.

'The fires are hot and there's work to be done! My apprentice ran off, off to join Mizâdi's band, he did. I don't mind a good war, but not when it hurts the forge. How am I supposed to make blades for Mizâdi when there's no one to help gather ore for the swords and collect wood for the fires?\n\n'You want to help? Well there may be some good left in this world after all. You can start by gathering some wood and ore, we have plenty of both outside of Urmâkh, to the east. Watch out for the jackals, they've been roaming closer and closer to the city proper.'
Mined iron ore for smithing ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collect Nukûsh's newly forged swords ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'Ah, that's enough to get me ahead for once. You move quick. You remind me of myself at a young age. Nice enough for you to help an old man with his tasks. I appreciate it. Anytime you want to come back, there's a spot at the forge for you.'
Pick up Nukûsh's freshly forged swords ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Deliver Nukûsh's swords to Numûru in Urmâkh

'There you are. Well you've gathered plenty of both at least. Leave them there, I'll take care of the ore. Add the wood to the fire, it's getting low. Then you can bring these swords to Numûru. Hope you don't mind sweating, there's no loafing here.'
Nukûsh the blacksmith has asked for your help in accomplishing his daily tasks, as his apprentice has joined Mizâdi's warriors.
Acquire iron ore and wood from outside Urmâkh to the east for Nukûsh, the blacksmith in Urmâkh.
Bring gathered wood and ore to Nukûsh in Urmâkh.
Speak again with Nukûsh in Urmâkh.
Feed the wood into the fire in the forge.
Bring gathered wood and ore to Nukûsh in Urmâkh
Nukûsh asks you to hammer out the blades on the blacksmithing anvil.
Bring gathered wood and ore to Nukûsh in Urmâkh
Nukûsh asks you to douse the blades in the dousing bucket.
Feed the wood into the fire in the forge
Collected Nukûsh's newly forged swords ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'My thanks to you. It's been fair too long since we had fresh blades. These will cut the Barkhûshim quite well, and any others who draw Mizâdi's ire. Give my regards, and that of the Subuzûri, to Nukûsh.'
Speak with Nukûsh in Urmâkh
